scripts.link:wasm:animation: pnpm --filter @vizij/animation-wasm run build && (cd npm/@vizij/animation-wasm && pnpm link --global)
scripts.link:wasm:graph: pnpm --filter @vizij/node-graph-wasm run build && (cd npm/@vizij/node-graph-wasm && pnpm link --global)
scripts.link:wasm:orchestrator: pnpm --filter @vizij/orchestrator-wasm run build && (cd npm/@vizij/orchestrator-wasm && pnpm link --global)
scripts.link:wasm: pnpm run link:wasm:animation && pnpm run link:wasm:graph && pnpm run link:wasm:orchestrator
scripts.build:wasm: pnpm run build:wasm:animation && pnpm run build:wasm:graph && pnpm run build:wasm:orchestrator
scripts.test:npm: pnpm --filter @vizij/animation-wasm run test && pnpm --filter @vizij/node-graph-wasm run test && pnpm --filter @vizij/orchestrator-wasm run test
